name: Jasmine Patel
persona: Jasmine is a 21-year-old psychology major who is determined to improve her academic performance. She is moderately conscientious and believes in her ability to succeed, though she sometimes struggles with staying disciplined, especially during stressful periods. Jasmine sets realistic grade goals and is motivated to achieve them, but test anxiety can occasionally hinder her performance. Despite setbacks, her perseverance helps her push through challenges and maintain steady progress toward her degree.
